title: Twelve Steps And Twelve Traditions By Alcoholics Anonymous.pdf
description:
# Author: Alcoholics Anonymous World Services/Bill Wilson
# Title: Twelve Steps and Twelve Traditions
# Published by: Alcoholics Anonymous World Services
# Book ISBN: 978-0916856298
# Filesize: 1.07 MB

Originally published in 1952, this classic book is used by A.A. members and groups around the world. It lays out the principles by which A.A. members recover and by which the fellowship functions. The basic text clarifies the Steps which constitute the A.A. way of life and the Traditions, by which A.A. maintains its unity.

NOTE: I put AAWS/Bill Wilson because it was in fact written by Bill Wilson however it does NOT state his name on the cover or anywhere else because of the 11th Tradition which states:

"Our public relations policy is based on attraction rather than promotion; we need always maintain personal anonymity at the level of press, radio, and films."
